Description: Select data from a SQL databsae

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code: Select-Sql -FromTable ATable -Property Name, Day, Month, Year -Where "Year = 2005" -ConnectionSetting SqlAzureConnectionString

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 3
Examples.Code: Select-Sql -FromTable INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES -ConnectionSetting "Data Source=$env:ComputerName;Initial Catalog=Master;Integrated Security=SSPI;" -Property Table_Name -verbose

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 4
Examples.Code:
Select-Sql "
SELECT  sys.objects.name,
    SUM(row_count) AS 'Row Count',
    SUM(reserved_page_count) * 8.0 / 1024 AS 'Table Size (MB)'
FROM sys.dm_db_partition_stats, sys.objects
WHERE sys.dm_db_partition_stats.object_id = sys.objects.object_id
GROUP BY sys.objects.name
ORDER BY [Table Size (MB)] DESC
"
